text: Ernest Burton (2 September 1921 – July 1999) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Atlas & Norfolk Works, and was on the books of Sheffield Wednesday without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Sportspeople from Sheffield Category:1999 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Forgemasters Sports & Social F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ernie Burton
